comments.body: It's a bit weird that the schema of case class of value classes is not consistent with the schema of tuple of value classes, but there seems no better solution as we need to keep backward compatibility.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +503,507 @@
  test("SPARK-20384: schema for tuple_2 of value class") {
    val schema = schemaFor[(IntWrapper, StrWrapper)]
    assert(
      schema === Schema(
